Class BusinessSoftware

java.lang.Object
  BusinessSoftware

public class BusinessSoftware
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a software application that can be borrowed by a business.

Version:
Summer 2011
Author:
Franklin University

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

getApplicationName

public java.lang.String getApplicationName()
Returns the name of the application software.

Returns:
the name of the application software.

getBusinessId

public int getBusinessId()
Returns the id of the business that borrowred the software. The id is set to 0 if the software is not currently on loan.

Returns:
the id of the business that borrowed the software.

getDateToBeReturned

public java.lang.String getDateToBeReturned()
Returns the date when the software is to be returned. The date will be in the format mm/dd/yyyy.

Returns:
the date when the software should be returned.

getPublisher

public java.lang.String getPublisher()
Returns the publisher of the software.

Returns:
the publisher of the software.

public void setApplicationName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name of the application software.

Parameters:

setBusinessId

public void setBusinessId(int id)
Sets the id of business that borrowed the software.

Parameters:
id - the id of the business the borrowed the software.

setDateToBeReturned

public void setDateToBeReturned(java.lang.String date)
Sets the date when the software is to be returned. The date should be in the format mm/dd/yyyy.

Parameters:
date - the date when the software should be returned.

setPublisher

public void setPublisher(java.lang.String name)
Sets the publisher of the software.

Parameters:
name - the name of the publisher.
